River Tournament

Weekly pool tournaments at River Pool and Sports Bar. Cash prizes, bragging rights, and unforgettable nights!

Loading Bracket...

Want to join this week's tournament? Sign up here!

Bracket

    Waitlist

      Even if the bracket and waitlist above are full, spots are not guaranteed until registration is complete, including Fargo rate verification and entry fee payment. Last-minute cancellations, no-shows, or Fargo rating changes can open up spots. If your name is not listed in the Bracket or Waitlist, you can text the tournament director at 760-793-8319 to confirm availability.

On mobile devices like phones and tablets, it should default to closed, and if the user opens it and taps a nav item, it should be closed when the new page loads.           ChatGPT said: Thanks for sharing the updated page source — the hamburger toggle is very close, but there’s a key issue based on your current HTML + CSS: 🔍 What's Still Blocking the Menu Toggle You’re using this CSS rule: #menu-toggle:checked ~ .menu { transform: translateX(0); } But your current HTML structure is:
          ...
          This breaks the ~ (sibling) relationship. For that selector to apply, .menu must appear after the checkbox and be a sibling — not separated by other elements like
